Blueprint Ingredients

40 research-backed ingredients from Blueprint supplements

Vitamin C

Vitamins

A water-soluble vitamin and powerful antioxidant essential for immune function, collagen synthesis, and cellular protection against oxidative stress. As ascorbic acid, it plays a critical role in various metabolic processes.

Immune supportAntioxidant protectionCollagen synthesis

Blueprint dosage: 250mg (278% DV)

Creatine Monohydrate

Amino Acids

A naturally occurring compound that plays a critical role in ATP regeneration, supporting muscle energy metabolism, cognitive function, and cellular energy production. The most researched and proven form of creatine.

Muscle strengthCognitive functionCellular energy

Blueprint dosage: 2.5g - 5g daily

Calcium Alpha-Ketoglutarate

Minerals

A calcium salt of alpha-ketoglutarate, an intermediate in the Krebs cycle. Supports bone health, cellular energy production, and nitrogen metabolism. Shown to have longevity benefits in research studies.

Bone healthCellular energyLongevity support

Blueprint dosage: 2000mg (provides 400mg calcium, 31% DV)

Magnesium Citrate

Minerals

A highly bioavailable form of magnesium that supports over 300 enzymatic reactions in the body, including energy production, muscle function, nerve transmission, and sleep quality.

Sleep qualityMuscle recoveryEnergy metabolism

Blueprint dosage: 150mg (36% DV)

Taurine

Amino Acids

A sulfur-containing amino acid with numerous physiological roles including bile salt formation, antioxidant activity, cardiovascular health, and calcium signaling regulation.

Cardiovascular healthAntioxidantCalcium regulation

Blueprint dosage: 1500mg

Glycine

Amino Acids

The simplest amino acid and a major component of collagen. Acts as an inhibitory neurotransmitter, supports sleep quality, and plays a role in detoxification and antioxidant defense.

Sleep qualityCollagen synthesisCalming effect

Blueprint dosage: 1200mg

L-Lysine

Amino Acids

An essential amino acid crucial for protein synthesis, collagen formation, calcium absorption, and immune function. Must be obtained through diet or supplementation.

Collagen synthesisCalcium absorptionImmune support

Blueprint dosage: 1000mg

L-Glutathione (Reduced)

Antioxidants

The body's master antioxidant, a tripeptide that plays a central role in cellular defense against oxidative stress, detoxification, and immune function. The reduced form is the active antioxidant state.

Cellular defenseDetoxificationImmune modulation

Blueprint dosage: 250mg

L-Theanine

Amino Acids

An amino acid found in tea leaves that promotes relaxation without drowsiness. Increases alpha brain wave activity and supports focus, sleep quality, and stress response.

RelaxationFocusSleep quality

Blueprint dosage: 200mg

Glucosamine Sulfate

Other

A natural compound found in cartilage that supports joint health and may have systemic anti-aging effects. Used as a building block for glycosaminoglycans and proteoglycans.

Joint healthCartilage supportLongevity

Blueprint dosage: 750mg

Sodium Hyaluronate

Other

The sodium salt of hyaluronic acid, a glycosaminoglycan that holds water in tissues. Supports skin hydration, joint lubrication, and tissue repair.

Skin hydrationJoint lubricationTissue repair

Blueprint dosage: 120mg

Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol)

Vitamins

The biologically active form of vitamin D, essential for bone health, immune function, cellular differentiation, and numerous other physiological processes. Synthesized in skin upon sun exposure.

Bone healthImmune modulationCellular health

Blueprint dosage: 50mcg (2000 IU, 250% DV)

Nicotinamide Riboside

Vitamins

A form of vitamin B3 and precursor to NAD+, a critical coenzyme for cellular energy metabolism, DNA repair, and sirtuin activation. Gaining attention for longevity research.

NAD+ productionDNA repairCellular energy

Blueprint dosage: 300mg

Broccoli Seed Extract (Glucoraphanin)

Polyphenols

A concentrated extract from broccoli seeds containing glucoraphanin, which converts to sulforaphaneâ€”a potent Nrf2 activator that enhances cellular detoxification and antioxidant defense.

DetoxificationAntioxidant defenseCellular protection

Blueprint dosage: 200mg (provides 20mg glucoraphanin)

Fisetin

Polyphenols

A flavonoid polyphenol found in strawberries and other fruits with potent senolytic properties (removes senescent cells). Also has antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and neuroprotective effects.

Senolytic activityAnti-inflammatoryNeuroprotection

Blueprint dosage: 100mg

Luteolin

Polyphenols

A flavone polyphenol with anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and neuroprotective properties. Found in celery, peppers, and other vegetables. Supports brain health and immune modulation.

Anti-inflammatoryNeuroprotectionImmune modulation

Blueprint dosage: 100mg

Ubiquinol (Reduced CoQ10)

Antioxidants

The active, reduced form of Coenzyme Q10 essential for mitochondrial ATP production and cellular energy. Acts as a potent lipid-soluble antioxidant. Bioavailability is higher than ubiquinone form.

Mitochondrial energyCardiovascular healthAntioxidant

Blueprint dosage: 50mg

Lactobacillus Acidophilus

Probiotics

A probiotic bacterium that supports gut health, immune function, and nutrient absorption. One of the most well-researched probiotic strains with documented health benefits.

Gut healthImmune supportNutrient absorption

Blueprint dosage: 20mg (4 Billion CFU)

Spermidine

Other

A polyamine compound that induces autophagy (cellular recycling), supports cardiovascular health, and may have longevity benefits. Naturally found in wheat germ and aged cheeses.

Autophagy activationCardiovascular healthCellular renewal

Blueprint dosage: 10mg (as Trihydrochloride)

Boron

Minerals

A trace mineral essential for bone health, cognitive function, and hormone metabolism. Supports vitamin D and magnesium metabolism.

Bone healthHormone metabolismCognitive function

Blueprint dosage: 3mg (as Glycinate)

Lithium Orotate

Minerals

A trace mineral at microdoses that supports brain health, mood regulation, and cognitive function. Low-dose lithium is being studied for longevity and neuroprotection.

Brain healthMood supportNeuroprotection

Blueprint dosage: 1mg (as Orotate)

Vitamin E

Vitamins

A fat-soluble antioxidant that protects cell membranes from oxidative damage. As d-alpha-tocopherol, it's the natural and most bioactive form.

Cellular protectionAntioxidant defenseSkin health

Blueprint dosage: 67mg (447% DV, as d-alpha-Tocopherol)

B-Complex Vitamins

Vitamins

Complete B-vitamin complex including Thiamin (B1), Riboflavin (B2), Niacin (B3), B6, Folate (B9), and B12. Essential for energy metabolism, brain function, and cellular processes.

Energy metabolismBrain functionCellular health

Blueprint dosage: Various (see individual B vitamins)

Zinc

Minerals

An essential trace mineral critical for immune function, DNA synthesis, wound healing, and over 300 enzymatic reactions. Must be obtained through diet or supplementation.

Immune functionCellular defenseWound healing

Blueprint dosage: 15mg (136% DV, as Bisglycinate)

Selenium

Minerals

An essential trace mineral that functions as a cofactor for antioxidant enzymes (glutathione peroxidases) and supports thyroid hormone metabolism.

Antioxidant defenseThyroid supportCellular protection

Blueprint dosage: 28mcg (51% DV, as L-Selenomethionine)

Omega-3 Fatty Acids (DHA/EPA)

Other

Essential fatty acids from algae oil (vegan source). DHA and EPA support brain health, cardiovascular function, inflammation regulation, and cellular membrane integrity.

Brain healthHeart healthAnti-inflammatory

Blueprint dosage: Variable (high potency from algae)

Collagen Peptides

Amino Acids

Hydrolyzed collagen protein providing amino acids (glycine, proline, hydroxyproline) that support skin elasticity, joint health, and gut function.

Skin elasticityJoint healthGut function

Blueprint dosage: Variable (typically 10-20g)

Ashwagandha (KSM-66)

Adaptogens

An adaptogenic herb (Withania somnifera) that helps the body manage stress, supports cognitive function, and may improve sleep quality and physical performance.

Stress managementCognitive functionSleep quality

Blueprint dosage: 300mg

Rhodiola Rosea

Adaptogens

An adaptogenic herb that enhances resilience to stress, reduces fatigue, and supports cognitive function. Contains rosavins and salidrosides as active compounds.

Fatigue reductionStress resilienceMental performance

Blueprint dosage: 100mg

N-Acetyl-L-Cysteine (NAC)

Amino Acids

A precursor to glutathione with potent antioxidant and mucolytic properties. Supports respiratory health, detoxification, and may have neuroprotective effects.

Glutathione supportRespiratory healthAntioxidant

Blueprint dosage: 600mg

Ginger Extract

Other

A concentrated extract of ginger (Zingiber officinale) with anti-inflammatory, digestive, and anti-nausea properties. Contains gingerols and shogaols as active compounds.

Anti-inflammatoryDigestive supportNausea relief

Blueprint dosage: 250mg

Curcumin (from Turmeric)

Polyphenols

The primary bioactive compound in turmeric with potent anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, and potential longevity benefits. Poor bioavailability requires advanced formulations.

Anti-inflammatoryAntioxidantJoint health

Blueprint dosage: 100mg (as curcuminoids)

Iodine

Minerals

An essential trace mineral required for thyroid hormone synthesis. Critical for metabolism, brain development, and cellular function.

Thyroid functionMetabolismCognitive development

Blueprint dosage: 200mcg (133% DV)

Manganese

Minerals

An essential trace mineral that serves as a cofactor for antioxidant enzymes and is involved in bone development, metabolism, and wound healing.

Antioxidant defenseBone healthMetabolism

Blueprint dosage: 1mg (43% DV)

Lutein and Zeaxanthin

Carotenoids

Carotenoid antioxidants that accumulate in the macula of the eye and protect against blue light and oxidative damage. Support vision health and may benefit cognitive function.

Vision protectionBlue light filteringCognitive support

Blueprint dosage: Variable (5:1 ratio)

Astaxanthin

Carotenoids

A potent carotenoid antioxidant with unique molecular structure that spans cell membranes. Superior antioxidant capacity compared to other carotenoids.

Potent antioxidantAnti-inflammatorySkin health

Blueprint dosage: Variable

Lycopene

Carotenoids

A bright red carotenoid found in tomatoes with potent antioxidant properties. Most efficient quencher of singlet oxygen among common carotenoids.

AntioxidantProstate healthCardiovascular support

Blueprint dosage: 10mg

Folate (L-5-MTHF)

Vitamins

The bioactive form of folate (5-methyltetrahydrofolate) that bypasses MTHFR genetic variants. Essential for DNA synthesis, methylation, and cellular division.

Methylation supportDNA synthesisNeurological health

Blueprint dosage: 200mcg DFE (50% DV)

Vitamin B12 (Methylcobalamin)

Vitamins

The bioactive form of vitamin B12 essential for neurological function, red blood cell formation, and DNA synthesis. Critical for methylation and homocysteine metabolism.

Neurological healthRed blood cellsMethylation

Blueprint dosage: 125mcg (5208% DV, as Methylcobalamin)

Biotin

Vitamins

A B-vitamin (B7) essential for fatty acid synthesis, amino acid metabolism, and glucose metabolism. Important for healthy hair, skin, and nails.

MetabolismHair and nail healthSkin health

Blueprint dosage: 50mcg (167% DV)
